name: doomridge-dungeon-demo
description:
A short dungeon crawler demo featuring pixel art assets available in our Pixel Dungeon Pack. Descend into an endless labyrinth full of traps, monsters, and treasure.

Controls:
WADS or Arrow Keys to Move
Spacebar, Z, or Left Click Mouse to Attack or Start Game
E or X to Open Chest/Open Door/Climb Down
Escape for Pause Menu

Progress is saved every floor; if you encounter a game breaking bug simply refresh your browser.

Asset Pack: https://pixelpajamastudios.itch.io/16x16-pixel-art-dungeon-pack
Demo and Art by: Pixel Pajama Studios
Music from: Three Red Hearts by Abstraction Music
Title Display Font: Alagard by Hewett Tsoi

Share your deepest run with us!
Discord | Twitter | Instagram | Facebook
